meanings.definition: A protective head covering worn for safety.
meanings.sent1: I always wear my casco when riding my bike.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker put on his casco before entering the site.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a tiny casco and pretended to be a knight.
meanings.sent4: Her casco of confidence shielded her from criticism.
meanings.sent5: The shiny casco gleamed under the sun, a symbol of protection.

meanings.definition: The hard outer covering of a nut or seed.
meanings.sent1: The casco of the walnut cracked open easily.
meanings.sent2: She carefully removed the casco of the almond before eating it.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel struggled to crack the tough casco of the hazelnut.
meanings.sent4: The acorn's casco protected the seed inside like armor.
meanings.sent5: The casco of the coconut was difficult to break, hiding the delicious flesh within.

meanings.definition: The shell of a crustacean or mollusk.
meanings.sent1: The hermit crab searched for a new casco to call home.
meanings.sent2: The lobster's casco was hard and spiky for protection.
meanings.sent3: The snail carried its casco on its back wherever it went.
meanings.sent4: The crab's casco blended perfectly with the sandy ocean floor.
meanings.sent5: The colorful casco of the seashell caught the eye of the beachcomber.

meanings.definition: The upper part of a ship's hull.
meanings.sent1: The waves crashed against the casco of the ship.
meanings.sent2: The sailors painted the casco of the vessel to prevent rust.
meanings.sent3: The pirate captain stood proudly on the casco of his ship.
meanings.sent4: The casco of the boat creaked as it sailed through the rough sea.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the casco of the galleon told stories of its voyages.

meanings.definition: A helmet worn for riding a motorcycle or bicycle.
meanings.sent1: Before going for a ride, make sure to wear your casco.
meanings.sent2: The cyclist adjusted the straps on his casco before starting the race.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon tried to wear a tiny casco while riding a toy bike.
meanings.sent4: Her casco of protection made her feel invincible on the road.
meanings.sent5: The sleek design of the casco made the rider look like a futuristic warrior.
